Sorry about that:

/gpfs/alpinetds/csc275/proj-shared/piet/miniconda-summit/conda-bld/pytorch_1520612130385/_h_env_placehold_placehold_placehold_placehold_placehold_placehold_placehold_placehold_placehold_placehold_placehold_placehold_placehold_placehold_placehold_placehold/compiler_compat/ld: cannot open linker script file /gpfs/alpinetds/csc275/proj-shared/piet/miniconda-summit/conda-bld/pytorch_1520612130385/work/tools/pytorch.version: No such file or directory collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status

Background:
I am trying to build a conda recipe for pytorch for ppc64le.

I believe the issue is triggered by section between line 680 and line 691 in the setup.py script.
